Commission.definition: a formal written authorization to perform various acts and duties [a notary's ] 2 a

1.definition: a formal written authorization to perform various acts and duties [a notary's ]

2 a.definition: authority to act for, in behalf of, or in place of another

sub_terms.b: a task or matter entrusted to one as the agent for another

3 a.definition: a group of persons directed to perform a duty

sub_terms.b: a government agency [Federal Trade] see also
sub_terms.c: a city council having legislative and executive functions

4.definition: an act of committing something [ of the crime]

5.definition: a fee paid to an agent or employee for transacting a piece of business or performing a servicea percentage of the money received paid to the agent responsible for the business
